vulnerable.commit_message:
virtio-serial: fix ANY_LAYOUT

Don't assume a specific layout for control messages.
Required by virtio 1.

Signed-off-by: Michael S. Tsirkin <mst@redhat.com>
Reviewed-by: Amit Shah <amit.shah@redhat.com>
Reviewed-by: Jason Wang <jasowang@redhat.com>
vulnerable.cve_desc: Buffer overflow in the send_control_msg function in hw/char/virtio-serial-bus.c in QEMU before 2.4.0 allows guest users to cause a denial of service (QEMU process crash) via a crafted virtio control message.
